Settings.QueryText: SELECT CatalogSchedules.Ref AS Ref, CatalogSchedules.DeletionMark AS DeletionMark, CatalogSchedules.Predefined AS Predefined, CatalogSchedules.Code AS Code, CatalogSchedules.Description AS Description, CatalogSchedules.ScheduleType AS ScheduleType, CatalogSchedules.WorkweekDuration AS WorkweekDuration, CatalogSchedules.BeginnigDate AS BeginnigDate, CatalogSchedules.Calendar AS Calendar, CatalogSchedules.Color AS Color, CatalogSchedules.Periods, " " AS Marker FROM Catalog.WorkSchedules AS CatalogSchedules

v8:item.v8:content: Resources work by schedule period presentation

Settings.QueryText:
SELECT ResourcesWorkSchedules.EnterpriseResource AS EnterpriseResource, SUM(CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END) AS HoursTotal, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 1 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number1, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 2 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number2, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 3 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number3, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 4 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number4, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 5 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number5, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 6 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number6, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 7 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number7, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 8 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number8, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 9 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number9, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 10 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number10, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 11 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number11, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 12 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number12, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 13 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number13, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 14 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number14, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 15 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number15, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 16 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number16, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 17 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number17, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 18 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number18, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 19 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number19, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 20 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number20, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 21 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number21, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 22 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number22, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 23 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number23, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 24 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number24, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 25 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number25, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 26 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number26, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 27 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number27, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 28 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number28, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 29 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number29, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 30 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number30, SUM(CASE WHEN Day(WorkSchedules.BeginTime) = 31 THEN CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END ELSE 0 END) AS Number31, WeekDay(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH)) AS DayOfWeek1, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 1)) AS DayOfWeek2, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 2)) AS DayOfWeek3, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 3)) AS DayOfWeek4, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 4)) AS DayOfWeek5, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 5)) AS DayOfWeek6, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 6)) AS DayOfWeek7, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 7)) AS DayOfWeek8, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 8)) AS DayOfWeek9, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 9)) AS DayOfWeek10, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 10)) AS DayOfWeek11, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 11)) AS DayOfWeek12, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 12)) AS DayOfWeek13, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 13)) AS DayOfWeek14, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 14)) AS DayOfWeek15, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 15)) AS DayOfWeek16, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 16)) AS DayOfWeek17, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 17)) AS DayOfWeek18, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 18)) AS DayOfWeek19, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 19)) AS DayOfWeek20, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 20)) AS DayOfWeek21, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 21)) AS DayOfWeek22, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 22)) AS DayOfWeek23, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 23)) AS DayOfWeek24, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 24)) AS DayOfWeek25, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 25)) AS DayOfWeek26, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 26)) AS DayOfWeek27, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 27)) AS DayOfWeek28, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 28)) AS DayOfWeek29, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 29)) AS DayOfWeek30, WeekDay(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 30)) AS DayOfWeek31, CASE WHEN MONTH(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH)) = MONTH(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 27)) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS IsDate28, CASE WHEN MONTH(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH)) = MONTH(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 28)) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS IsDate29, CASE WHEN MONTH(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH)) = MONTH(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 29)) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS IsDate30, CASE WHEN MONTH(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH)) = MONTH(DATEADD(BEGINOFPERIOD(&BeginTime, MONTH), Day, 30)) THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS IsDate31 FROM InformationRegister.ResourcesWorkSchedules AS ResourcesWorkSchedules LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.WorkSchedules AS WorkSchedules ON ResourcesWorkSchedules.WorkSchedule = WorkSchedules.WorkSchedule LEFT JOIN (SELECT TOP 1 ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period AS Period, ResourcesWorkSchedules.EnterpriseResource AS EnterpriseResource FROM InformationRegister.ResourcesWorkSchedules AS ResourcesWorkSchedules WHERE ResourcesWorkSchedules.WorkSchedule <> &WorkSchedule AND ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period <= &EndTime
ORDER BY Period) AS NestedSelect ON ResourcesWorkSchedules.EnterpriseResource = NestedSelect.EnterpriseResource WHERE WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= &BeginTime AND WorkSchedules.EndTime <= &EndTime AND ResourcesWorkSchedules.WorkSchedule = &WorkSchedule AND WorkSchedules.WorkSchedule = &WorkSchedule AND ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period <= &EndTime
GROUP BY ResourcesWorkSchedules.EnterpriseResource
HAVING SUM(CASE WHEN WorkSchedules.BeginTime < ResourcesWorkSchedules.Period OR WorkSchedules.BeginTime >= ISNULL(NestedSelect.Period, "00010101") THEN 0 WHEN DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second) = 86399 THEN 24 ELSE DATEDIFF(WorkSchedules.BeginTime, DATEADD(WorkSchedules.EndTime, Second, 1), hour) END) > 0
